categories: Category:Star Wars Rebels home video releases

nodes.text: Star Wars Rebels: Complete Season One

Star Wars Rebels: Complete Season One is a home-video compilation of the first season of the animated series Star Wars Rebels, as well as the series' one-hour movie premiere, Spark of Rebellion. The set was released in Blu-ray and DVD on September 1, 2015.
The disc includes all fifteen episodes and four shorts.
A limited steelbook edition of the Blu-Ray editions
